items.name: Item: WordShuffle
items.instructions: Put the words in the correct order to form a sentence.
sentences: This is my d[og].|hint DOG| cat bat ant fig
This is my c[at].|hint CAT|dog bat ant fig
This is my b[at].|hint BAT|dog cat ant fig
This is my a[nt].|hint ANT|dog cat bat fig
This is my f[ig].|hint FIG|dog cat bat ant

items.name: Item: Typing GapFill
items.instructions: Fill in the missing words or letters

items.name: Item: Free Writing
items.instructions: Type your answer to the question in the text area below.
items.text:
Write one original example sentence for each of the following words.
{ai data1}
items.freewritingaidata2:
Modern cities endanger the environment.
Understanding languages enriches your travel experiences.
Children enjoy playing games.
The sahara desert is enlarging quickly.
The red army encircled the blue army.
